jcr:root.rpx.prod.success.mail.body: Hello, the latest production RPX feed data from Cognition is live on student lending pages of suntrust.com.
jcr:root.rpx.prod.success.mail.subject: Success: ${jobDescription} - ${workflowDescription}
jcr:root.rpx.prod.system.failure.mail.body: Hello, an error has occurred in the workflow process and has prevented Cognition's latest production RPX feed data from going live on SunTrust.com. Please initiate a new workflow.
jcr:root.rpx.prod.system.failure.mail.subject: Error: ${jobDescription} - ${workflowDescription}
jcr:root.rpx.schedule.failure.mail.body: Hello, the overnight RPX job failed, and the latest RPX data is not up to date all pages that fall under the following parent path:${publishenvironment}loans/student-loans. Old/Existing RPX data will continue to be displayed on the pages.
jcr:root.rpx.schedule.failure.mail.subject: Error: Student Lending Rates Automated workflow
jcr:root.rpx.schedule.success.mail.body: Hello, the overnight RPX job was successful, and the latest RPX data is up to date on all pages that fall under the following parent path:${publishenvironment}loans/student-loans
jcr:root.rpx.schedule.success.mail.subject: Success: Student Lending Rates Automated workflow
jcr:root.rpx.uat.approve.mail.body: For informational purposes only (not to be considered a sign-off from SunTrust): rates using the test version of the Cognition RPX feed (UAT) have been reviewed by SunTrust Education Lending.
jcr:root.rpx.uat.approve.mail.subject: Accepted Review: ${jobDescription} - ${workflowDescription}
jcr:root.rpx.uat.reject.mail.body: Hello, the review of Cognitions UAT rates has been rejected by SunTrust Student Lending Line of Business.
jcr:root.rpx.uat.reject.mail.subject: Rejected Review: ${jobDescription} - ${workflowDescription}
jcr:root.rpx.uat.review.mail.body: Hello, the workflow has successfully populated RPX feed data from Cognition's UAT Environment to suntrust.com pages in AEM Author. The data is now ready for your review and approval in AEM Author.
jcr:root.rpx.uat.review.mail.subject: Review Required: ${jobDescription} - ${workflowDescription}
jcr:root.rpx.uat.sync.mail.body: Hello, a workflow has been initiated to update Cognition's UAT RPX feed data in the AEM Author Staging Database.
jcr:root.rpx.uat.sync.mail.subject: Workflow Initiated: ${jobDescription} - ${workflowDescription}
jcr:root.rpx.uat.system.failure.mail.body: Hello, an error has occurred in the workflow process and has prevented Cognitions UAT RPX feed data from being formally accepted by SunTrust Student Lending Line of Business. Please initiate a new workflow.
jcr:root.rpx.uat.system.failure.mail.subject: Error: ${jobDescription} - ${workflowDescription}
